cleaned_text: Welcome to Elk Grove Chiropractic At Elk Grove Chiropractic, we help you be healthy the natural way. A healthy nervous system and a lifestyle that maintains harmony and balance (homeostasis) is the best way to prevent a wide range of illnesses. Likewise, restoring homeostasis maximizes self-healing during any illness treatment. We want you to be healthy and pain-free without drugs or surgery as much as possible and through making lifestyle changes. What We Do We make sure that the spine is in proper alignment so that harmony and balance are restored. Proper spinal alignment provides pain relief, improves organ and joint function, relieves stress, improves mood, prevents illness, and improves cognitive ability. We also assist with correcting imbalances using natural remedies. Chiropractic Services We offer a variety of chiropractic services to keep you healthy. They include: - Gentle spinal correction - Spinal decompression - Coaching for lifestyle changes - Nutritional counseling - Massage therapy What to Expect Your visit with our chiropractor will consist of an exam, x-rays, and a presentation of findings. Then your care will follow three phases: relief care to reduce your symptoms, corrective care to prevent symptoms from rapidly recurring, and wellness care to help you stay in optimal condition. Contact Us to Get Started Call Elk Grove Chiropractic today at (916) 685-6380 for more information or to schedule an appointment.
